listings.title: 1 Bed Studio with KLCC View/Rooftop Pool - Netflix

details.description: Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety percaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.The spaceA amazing suite with a view, enjoy a full panoramic view of the KLCC Twin Towers and the KL skyline. Day or Night. Stylish decorated with a small private seated area to enjoy a good cup of coffee or tea.Guest accessThere are 2 Infinity pools here, located on Level 48 and Level 8.Level 48 is the rooftop infinity pool and gym. There's a small entry fees of USD 4 per person for the pool and gym usage. Children under 12 years old are not allowed. Proper swimwear is needed.Level 8 is the Garden view infinity pool and kids pool The pool entry fee is free of charge.Both Level 48 infinity pool, Gym and Level 8 infinity pool opening hours are 8am till 10pm.Other things to noteA great new place and a breath taking KLCC Twin Towers view and a stunning 360-degree KL view.Places of Interest1) KLCC Petronas Twin Towers - 3 Km2) Bukit Bintang - 4 Km3) Pavillion, Lot 10, Berjaya Times Square - 4 Km4) Night Market Jalan Alor - 4 Km5) Restaurants and Night Bars at Changkat Bukit Bintang - 4 Km6) Dataran Merdeka (Independence Square) - 7 Km7) Sultan Abdul Samad Building - 7 Km8) China Town - 7 Km9) Central Market - 8 Km10) KL Tower - 7 Km11) Botanical Garden - 8 Km12) Birds Park - 8 Km13) Batu Caves - 12 Km14) Theon Hou Temple - 15 Km15) Terminal Bus Station - 20 Km15) Putrajaya - 30 Km16) Genting Highland and Premium Outlet - 35 Km17) KLIA 1 & KLIA 2 Airport - 60 Km

We offer a relaxing escape with a beautiful garden and stunning city views.While you enjoy the tranquility of our village, just a few minutesâ€™ walk will take you to the bustling CBD, Jodd Fairs night market, Rama 9 subway station, and Central Rama 9 shopping mall. Weâ€™re also one subway stop from the Airport Link. You'll have the perfect mix of local charm and city convenience.Other things to noteImportant: To comply with Thai law (TM.30), all foreign guests are required to provide a photo of their passport for registration purposes before check-in. Thank you for your understanding.
